author: Donal Skehan
method: For the beans, combine all of the ingredients in a saucepan and season with salt and pepper. Bring to the boil, reduce to a simmer and cook uncovered for about 15 minutes until it has reduced to a nice sauce consistency. Toast the bread, divide between serving plates and top with the beans.
ingredients: 400g tin chopped tomatoes,  400g tin cannellini beans, drained,  1 tbsp tomato ketchup,  1 tbsp brown sugar,  200ml/7fl oz veg stock (using a stock cube) ,  salt and pepper,  4 slices wholemeal bread
